blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Melt Against Me
description:
by FoolishFortuna

Finally fishing out a box of strawberry ice lollies, Kiri grinned to himself. Maybe he could go to Bakugou’s room early with the offering of a cool treat, he thought to himself; though before then, he was going to eat at least one. He took two from the box and put it back in the freezer, kicking the door closed as he turned to drop the second lolly to the countertop beside him. He tore the clear plastic wrapper from the one he still held and tossed it into the bin, before sticking the red ice straight in his mouth and chomping down. Eijirou gave an appreciative hum at the taste and the coldness as he crunched and swallowed, before setting himself to the task of devouring his treat.

He heard a sharp intake of breath and raised his eyes to the doorway, a happy smile splitting his face around the ice pop between the points of his teeth, “hey man! You want one?” He offered as a shirtless Bakugou scowled and walked over.

Words: 3247, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 6 of Prompts From the Nest

  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou

blog.name: nijicx
blog.title: A Large Deep Pit for all my BNHA Art.

summary: Arturo is a SNAK. But anyways, how's he been lately? Has he met Shimi?
question: Arturo is a SNAK. But anyways, how's he been lately? Has he met Shimi?
answer:
He has! Though they don’t really hang out or anything. Most of their interactions happen on their way out to jog super in the morning. Arturo goes to sleep at around 6pm and wakes up at around 2, doing his homework and chores, before  going to jog around 4. Shimi on the other hand, is usually STILL UP at 4, playing videogames, so he jogs as a way to force his body to crash for a few hours before school starts.

Lately, his endeavor is doing secret early morning training sessions with Diss.

Arturo is incredibly graceful and nimble on his feet, he took ballroom dance and ballet as a kid after a period film his parents shot had a massive dance cast. After a recent match, she realized her mobility and ability to carry her voice while dodging hits was a problem, and begrudgingly asked him to teach her to be more sure on her feet.

title: Boku no Hero Academia saison 4
body:
Boku no Hero Academia saison 4

Boku no Hero Academia saison 4 sortira en octobre 2019 au Japon, cette nouvelle saison est animée par les studios Bones. Issu du, aujourd’hui fameux manga, écrit par Kôhei Horikoshi, et publié par la Shueisha, et par les éditions Ki-oon en France. La version française des saisons précédentes est visible chez Toonami.

Titre original : 僕のヒーローアカデミア
Genre: action, comédie, école, shounen, super pouvoir

View On WordPress

 Idk what y'all are gonna find here

summary: Kirishima was lying there, sprawled out over his bed, some type of noise in the background that blurred together to become muted...
body: Kirishima was lying there, sprawled out over his bed, some type of noise in the background that blurred together to become muted instead of noticable. The jogging bottoms he had adorned to relax in had rode up, exposing most of his lower legs to the pin prickles of cold air yet despite lying on his blanket, he could not find the will to move an inch with a body feeling like lead. Even as his feet got ambushed, feeling starting to leave his toes, replaced with a cold numbness. Thankfully a hoodie covered his top half, but even that seemed daunting, the rustle of oversized fabric louder in his mind scape, combined with the odd word from whatever background noise he had put on when he had first lied down. Sometimes the world just seemed too much, even for a positively cheery and encouraging person such as Kirishima. He’d bounce back, he always does, but perhaps simmering in his own private space wasn’t so bad for tonight. He’d be a hero, just not right then.

title: Tiffersthenerdy's Fic Recs
excerpt: Fic Index I will post fic recs from different fandoms (I currently have Attack on Titan, Yuri!!! on...
description: Hey guys! So I now run a Fic Rec Blog as well as this one. I’ve posted about half of my fic recs there so far. I take recommendations and I love to hunt down fics for people so hit me up! Also, this is a great time to promote yourself (I will promote the heck out of you), regardless of what fandom you write for or love so much. I just want people to be able to find good reads in one spot. So far I have Attack on Titan, My Hero Academia, and Yuri!!! on Ice. Check it out, spread the word, and all that fun stuff.  Thank you as always!

summary: Alaudidae - Chapter 1 - AmbroiseFramboise - Katekyou Hitman Reborn! [Archive of Our Own]
title: Alaudidae - Chapter 1 - AmbroiseFramboise - Katekyou Hitman Reborn! [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 4/?
Fandom: Katekyou Hitman Reborn!, 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Characters: Hibari Kyouya, Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Hisashi, Police Officers (Characters), Bakugou Katsuki, Hibird (Katekyou Hitman Reborn!)
Additional Tags: Reincarnation, Hibari does what he wants, Terrorizing everyone, Kinda Crack
Series: Part 1 of My Hero(es’s) Reincarnations
Summary:

As a Quirkless boy, the son of Hibari Hisashi and his wife Inko should be weak, right ?

Wrong. Hibari Kyoya is reborn in a strange world where people are just herbivorious as ever, but with powers. He promply decides to be a hero to be able to legaly beat up strongs opponents and restore Order.

Good Luck, UA and the world. You’re going to need it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Chapter 4 is posted !

summary: I wanted to rant about the most incel thing excusing mineta’s behavior, saying “well if he was attractive / a girl you wouldn’t...
question: I wanted to rant about the most incel thing excusing mineta’s behavior, saying “well if he was attractive / a girl you wouldn’t mind hurr durr” and look,,,, idk if it’s that way with other people but it sure as hell ain’t with me. If it’s an “attractive” guy or girl that climbs over a fucking sauna fence to see his naked classmates and starts foaming at the mouth because of it that’s creepy ass behavior and it literally,,,, doesn’t change with looks or gender lol
answer: people who defend mineta by saying that dont seem to realize that its not the character design that turns us off, it’s his personality and behavior. he could be the most conventionally attractive character in the series but if he still looking up girls’ skirts or over sauna walls he still and always will be a garbage dumpster fire

reblog.comment: people who defend mineta by saying that dont seem to realize that its not the character design that turns us off, it’s his personality and behavior. he could be the most conventionally attractive character in the series but if he still looking up girls’ skirts or over sauna walls he still and always will be a garbage dumpster fire

trail.content_raw: people who defend mineta by saying that dont seem to realize that its not the character design that turns us off, it’s his personality and behavior. he could be the most conventionally attractive character in the series but if he still looking up girls’ skirts or over sauna walls he still and always will be a garbage dumpster fire
trail.content: people who defend mineta by saying that dont seem to realize that its not the character design that turns us off, it’s his personality and behavior. he could be the most conventionally attractive character in the series but if he still looking up girls’ skirts or over sauna walls he still and always will be a garbage dumpster fire

summary: Whooop they are back from holiday and finally picked up the BNHA nitotan delivery for me. :D (Feels like everyone went on...
caption:
Whooop they are back from holiday and finally picked up the BNHA nitotan delivery for me. :D (Feels like everyone went on holiday in March except me huh. Even the baby had an overseas hol! (งツ)ว)

Saved a Party Todoroki for @the-honestlycrazycollection, and the rest will be thrown into Buy Now (when I have time to update it…). 

I’ve finished setting up the BNHA section today so we SHOULD be good to open the new web store for testing Fri - Sun.

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: ~✨❤ Doki! Doki! Forever Love ❤✨~
description:
by ALonelyGod

Midoriya Izuku died and woke up in the world of Otome Games! Reincarnated in the body of a villainous character, follow Izuku as he tries and fails to live a calm and quiet life away from canon.

YES. You think you’ve got enough reincarnated-in-an-otome-game manga, didn’t you? Well I haven’t. So heree. Have s'more.

Words: 1040, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Bakugou Katsuki, Sir Nighteye (My Hero Academia), Uraraka Ochako, Iida Tenya, Kirishima Eijirou, Todoroki Shouto
  • Relationships: Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Kirishima Eijirou/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Fluff and Humor, Fluff, Alternate Universe - Reincarnation, Alternate Universe - Fantasy, Dekubowl, otome game style, Magic, Romance, Eventual Romance, Since This Is An Otome Game Parody, Romance is a must!, I Accidentally Posted This, I Tried, Cant Remove, Error 404, No Angst, I Don’t Want Angst In This, maybe just a lil, This Will Be A Gay Harem, Everybody Is A Little In Love With Deku, But There Can Only Be One
